item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 27 Feb 2024
item.description:
1. Feedback / Help Wanted: Upcoming OCaml.org Cookbook Feature
  2. The OCaml community is signed up for Outreachy!
  3. Upcoming Caqti Release - TLS, Packaging, and minor breakage
  4. Discussions on the future of the opam repository
  5. dream-html 3.0.0
  6. Temporary increase in opam CI response times
  7. A Versatile OCaml Library for Git Interaction - Seeking Community Feedback
  8. Ocsigen: summary of recent releases
  9. fuseau 0.1
  10. How do we want to present OCaml to the World on OCaml.org?
  11. MirageOS hack retreat 2024 edition (April 22nd - 28th)
  12. Recruitement on the Catala project (French)
  13. Js_of_ocaml 5.7
  14. Eio-trace 0.1 and Eio 0.15
  15. Other OCaml News
